Detailed Description

Variable binding constraint.

This constraint -- inherited from former versions of TREX -- allows to restrict a numeric varaible to a specified singleton value or the closest value in its domain.

Note:
It proved usefull to ensure that an external goal argument are fully specified before being dispatched. Although this may be more efficiently replaced by some europa propagator which would then aloow the modeler to retain only the strict modeling aspect and give this extra task to the reactor integrator.
Author:
Conor McGann & Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
